events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but would like to request a refund as it does not fit me properly.
The issue has been identified as a refund request based on customer's message regarding product return.
The refund case has been assigned to agent Sarah M. for handling and resolution.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your jacket refund request. I'm here to assist you.
Could you please provide the order number and confirm that the jacket is unused and in original packaging?
The order number is 54838721. The jacket is unused and still packed in the original wrapping.
Thank you for confirming. We will initiate the refund process once you send the jacket back using the prepaid return label.
Thanks for the quick assistance! I will send the jacket back tomorrow using the label.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should appear in your account within 5 business days.
Just following up to ensure your refund was received and if you need any further assistance from us.
Closing this case now as the refund was successfully completed and no further action is needed from your side.
